channel.title: palo alto on IT的不參不肆
channel.description: Recent content in palo alto on IT的不參不肆

item.title: 將ad使用整合paloalto防火牆上
item.description: Palo alto 的官方說明如下 User-ID: Tie users and groups to your security policies User-ID seamlessly integrates Palo Alto Networks next-generation firewalls with a wide range of user repositories and terminal services environments. Depending on your network environment, there are a variety of ways you can map a user’s identity to an IP address. Some of these include: Authentication events User authentication Terminal services monitoring Client probing Directory services integration A powerful XML API 在數百台電腦上發現其中一台電腦有異常，也能迅速辨別是那一部門、那台電腦
